posts.post_content:
Is anyone or a group interest in purchasing a nice collection of T206's?  Not interested in breaking up!  Collection has 777 different cards all graded by SGC.  Here is the breakdown of the different backs:

222 Sovereign (48 Sovereign 150, 132 Sovereign 350, 42 Sovereign 460)
111 American Beauty (68 350 Frame, 32 350 No Frame, 11 460)
2 Broadleaf 350
12 Cycle (10 Cycle 350, 2 Cycle 460)
2 Carolina Brights
34 El Principe De Gales
2 Hindu
1 Lenox
56 Old Mill (40 Old Mill Southern)
31 Polar Bear
25 Tolstoi
175 Piedmont (1 Factory 42)
104 Sweet Caporal (28 Factory 649)

Here are links to my SGC Set Registry:

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=1578&userset=3927[/url]

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=239&userset=286[/url]

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=239&userset=351[/url]

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=1704&userset=5119[/url]

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=6&set=205&userset=0[/url]

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=6&set=207&userset=0[/url]

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=1036&userset=2280[/url]



Would be glad to email the  spreadsheet of all the cards.

Thanks, Bill

I can be emailed a [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url]
Best of luck. I wish that I had the $$ right now, that is quite an impressive back assortment! Steve
